entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Profile

Education

Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech) Sept. 2019 ‑ Jun. 2023 (Expected)

  • B.S. in Computer Science and Technology, Department of Computer Science and Engineering

  • GPA: 3.72 / 4.00

  • Supervisor: Prof. Xuan Song( Associate Professor)

National University of Singapore (NUS) ( May. 2022 ‑ Jul. 2022)

  • Course: Artificial Intelligence of Things

  • Grade: A‑

  • A Smart Wardrobe based on temperature prediction and image classification is developed, combined with Internet of things technology, machine learning and software engineering.

Publications

专利：《发车调度方法、装置、设备和储存介质》（初步审查合格）

Research Experience

Personalized Federate Learning of Trajectory Prediction ( Since Oct. 2022)

  • Supervised by Associate Professor Xuan Song

• Introducing Federate Leaning to federate the multi‑source trajectories in a distributed, edge‑personalized and privacy‑preserving manner

• Relevant literature reading, basic code testing, and preliminary research plan

End‑to‑End Text‑to‑Poster Generation

  • Supervised by Assitant Professor Bo Tang

  • Responsible for the processing of text to image generation

Emergency Rescue Plan Formulation and Management Method based on Real‑Time Hierarchical Division

Research Assistant, Supervisor: Associate Professor, Xuan Song

Aug. 2022 ‑ Current

• Planning of rescue areas under major disasters using data‑driven methods

• Participating in patent writing

Honors & Awards
entry.summary: Profile
